overview:
Jose A. del moral is an entrepreneur, conference organizer and angel investor from Spain. He also edits a couple of blogs on social networks and Enterprise software

Late in 1999, Jose was one of the founders of Ya.com, later sold to Deutsche Telekom. He’s also founded:

  • Alianzo, a community for bloggers and Twitter users
  • Metroo, a local services recommendation system.

He has invested in:

  • Agoranews, a videoblogging company based in Madrid.
  • Negociame, a Digg-like business news filtering system.
  • iBotanika, a social network for people who like plants.
  • Chicisimo, a social network for fashionistas

As a conference organizer, he organizes Startup 2.0, a european startups competition.
